author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Marathon Oil Says Michael Phelps, A Member Of Co's Board Of Directors Informed Board That He Will Not Be Standing For Re-Election
text:
May 9 (Reuters) - Marathon Oil Corp:
* MARATHON OIL CORP - ON MAY 3, MICHAEL E. J. PHELPS, A MEMBER OF COâ€™S BOARD OF DIRECTORS INFORMED BOARD THAT HE WILL NOT BE STANDING FOR RE-ELECTION
* MARATHON OIL CORP - BOARD ANTICIPATES REDUCING SIZE OF BOARD AFTER 2018 ANNUAL MEETING Source text: ( bit.ly/2I0L7wa ) Further company coverage:
